Mod.name: Binding of Noita
Mod.description:
A mod that aims to add as many items from Binding of Isaac as possible to Noita. This mod is a work in progress where I will gradually add items. [hr][/hr] [h1]Currently added:[/h1] [list] [*]3 Dollar Bill [*]Bob's Rotten Head [*]Brimstone [*]Dr. Fetus [*]Loki's Horns [*]Number One [*]Polyphemus [*]Sacred Heart [*]Spoon bender [*]Infestation 2 [*]Technology [*]Technology 2 [/list] [hr][/hr] [h1]Some previews:[/h1] [b]Brimstone[/b] [img]https://media1.giphy.com/media/VfEJYmcgfVPKvU3VL1/giphy.gif[/img]
[b]Infestation 2[/b] [img]https://media2.giphy.com/media/gKqroC0XfA0deWYc4i/giphy.gif[/img]
[b]Technology 2[/b] [img]https://media0.giphy.com/media/Y4tgFJ1Zc4cqPStSD8/giphy.gif[/img]
[b]Number One![/b] [img]https://media0.giphy.com/media/URqLwzlZJ84vWDfytE/giphy.gif[/img]
[b]Number one! + Loki's Horns[/b] [img]https://media0.giphy.com/media/JsPMEeo3jH5B1GOkMw/giphy.gif[/img]
[b]3 Dollar Bill + Loki's Horns[/b] [img]https://media4.giphy.com/media/UWz7DQIosw0wdeyBNd/giphy.gif[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/z5QmOTt.gif[/img]
